title: Programmable optics pioneer Lumotive opens new centers in Oman and Taiwan
description:
Lumotive has expanded with new leaders and new sites worldwide, meeting surging demand for its programmable optics platform.

The post Programmable optics pioneer Lumotive opens new centers in Oman and Taiwan appeared first on The Robot Report.
